SELECT chb.*, h.name as hospital_name, c.name as certificateName, c.code as code, c.limit_file_extension as limit_file_extension, c.need_expiry_date as need_expiry_date, c.maxium_file_size as maxium_file_size, c.maxium_file_count as maxium_file_count FROM certificate_hospital_business chb INNER JOIN `mscm-base`.hospital h on chb.hospital_id = h.id INNER JOIN certificate c ON chb.certificate_id = c.id
and chb.business_type_code = #{request.businessTypeCode}
and c.name like concat( '%', #{request.certificateName}, '%')
order by chb.gmt_modified desc
